## Use case #1: time series of daily IWV differences (GNSS - ERA5)

```{r}
rm(list = ls())

### paths to data and metadata
project = "use_case_1"
path_data = "./data/"
path_result = "./results/"
path_plot = "./plots/"
filename_metadata = "./metadata/metadata.txt"
station_name = "0alf"
# station_name = "clgo"
mylabely = "GNSS - ERA5 (kg/m2)"

### Segmentation options
selectionK = "All"
#selectionK = "BM_BJ"
selectionF = FALSE
FunctPart = TRUE
VarMonthly = TRUE
Kmax = 30

### Validation options
max_dist_validation = 62

### Screening options
max_dist_cluster = 80
alpha_cluster = 0.05

### Test options
alpha_test_CP = 0.05

source("./user_function.R")
```
